name: Soda Drinker
description:
--- FREE, FREE, FREE SODA --- This product is an unofficial fanmade version!

World’s No.1 FPS Game is finally here ( First Person SODA ) for FREE !! Enjoy magical scenery, extreme situations in a uniquely designed world.

Ever wondered how it is like to be alone in the endless desert only with a can of finely brewed soda in your hand? Or you wanted to laugh in the face of death and fear doing extreme soda drinking in front of a whole ruthless bear family? Maybe you just want to hang with unicorns and other magical creatures and share a sip. Now there’s your chance!!

You can do all of this and more with our highly realistic soda drinking simulator. Drink soda like there's no tomorrow!

Collect bonus soda cans for excitement and sign of your awesomeness, drink like the only pro’s do! Be unique , be different, be a pro soda drinker!!

FEATURES :

Highly detailed and realistic SDE ( Soda Drinking Engine ) with HD light effects and 3D soundEffects, step effects , bob and a lot more.
Uniquely designed handcrafted extreme environments for your soda drinking needs ( and coming more maps FREE with each update! )
Your very own soda with cool lightning effects like, specular effects, shadows and more!
Real Time Soda Simulation!
